subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Pistons, who rolled to the best record (64-18) in the N.B.A this season, are one loss from elimination, trailing by 3-2 to the upstart Cleveland Cavaliers in their best-of-seven playoff series.
